statements: SELECT * FROM access_control
SELECT user_id, username FROM access_control
SELECT email FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM access_control WHERE user_id > 10
SELECT * FROM access_control ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM access_control WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM access_control ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE username = 'admin' AND password = 'pass123';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM access_control WHERE username LIKE 'user%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, role FROM users JOIN user_access ON users.id = user_access.user_id WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password, id FROM users WHERE username = 'johndoe';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_access ON users.id = user_access.user_id WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username, password, role, access_level FROM users JOIN user_access ON users.id = user_access.user_id WHERE access_level >= 5;
SELECT id, username, password, role FROM users JOIN user_access ON users.id = user_access.user_id ORDER BY username DESC, role ASC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT role_name FROM roles
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%'
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.role_id IS NULL
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.user_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id=1001 AND role_id=2001;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND accessed_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM personal_info WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT access_level FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT activity, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM personal_info ORDER BY info_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT activity, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
